zh-cn: きゅうしゅうだいがく

description.zh-cn: 日本一所本部位于福冈县福冈市西区元冈的国立研究型综合大学。学校起源于1867年的福冈藩医学校赞生馆，前身是1911年创建的旧制帝国大学之一九州帝国大学。
description.en: A Japanese national research university located in Nishi-ku, Fukuoka, Fukuoka Prefecture. Its origin can be traced back to the Fukuoka Domain Medical School, Sanseikan, established in 1867, and its predecessor was Kyushu Imperial University, one of the Imperial Universities established in 1911.

description.zh-cn: 福冈藩设立的医学教育藩校，为九州大学的起源。
description.en: A medical school established by the Fukuoka Domain, which is the origin of Kyushu University.

description.zh-cn: 日本江户时代的一个藩，设立了赞生馆，即九州大学的前身。
description.en: A domain in the Edo period of Japan that established Sanseikan, the predecessor of Kyushu University.

description.zh-cn: 日本旧制帝国大学之一。其福冈医科大学是九州大学的前身之一。
description.en: One of the former Imperial Universities of Japan. Its Fukuoka College of Medicine was a predecessor to Kyushu University.

nodes.id: 京都帝国大学福冈医科大学

zh-cn: 京都帝国大学福冈医科大学

description.zh-cn: 作为京都帝国大学的分科大学设立，是九州大学的前身。
description.en: Established as a college of Kyoto Imperial University, it is a predecessor of Kyushu University.

description.zh-cn: 日本财阀，其捐赠促成了九州帝国大学的成立。
description.en: A Japanese zaibatsu whose donation contributed to the establishment of Kyushu Imperial University.

description.zh-cn: 德裔物理学家，曾访问九州帝国大学。
description.en: German-born theoretical physicist who visited Kyushu Imperial University.

nodes.id: 九州大学附属医学专门部

zh-cn: 九州大学附属医学专门部

description.zh-cn: 1949年并入新制九州大学的机构之一。
description.en: One of the institutions that merged into the new Kyushu University in 1949.

description.zh-cn: 1949年并入新制九州大学的机构之一。
description.en: One of the institutions that merged into the new Kyushu University in 1949.

description.zh-cn: 1949年并入新制九州大学的机构之一。
description.en: One of the institutions that merged into the new Kyushu University in 1949.

description.zh-cn: 于2003年与九州大学合并的大学。
description.en: A university that merged with Kyushu University in 2003.

description.zh-cn: 日本宇航员，九州大学校友，首位日本籍国际空间站站长。
description.en: Japanese astronaut, Kyushu University alumnus, and the first Japanese commander of the International Space Station.

description.zh-cn: 日本化学家，九州大学校友、教授，分子组织化学先驱，京都奖得主。
description.en: Japanese chemist, Kyushu University alumnus and professor, a pioneer in molecular organization chemistry, and a Kyoto Prize laureate.

description.zh-cn: 日本化学家，九州大学校友、教授，分子机器先驱，2016年诺贝尔化学奖候选人。
description.en: Japanese chemist, Kyushu University alumnus and professor, a pioneer in molecular machines, and a candidate for the 2016 Nobel Prize in Chemistry.

description.zh-cn: 日本物理学家，九州大学校友、教授，原子序第113号新元素鉨的发现者。
description.en: Japanese physicist, Kyushu University alumnus and professor, and the discoverer of the new element with atomic number 113, Nihonium.

description.zh-cn: Siri发明者之一，Sentient Technologiese公司CEO，九州大学校友。
description.en: One of the inventors of Siri, CEO of Sentient Technologies, and a Kyushu University alumnus.

description.zh-cn: 日本物理学家，九州大学校友、教授，波兹曼奖得主。
description.en: Japanese physicist, Kyushu University alumnus and professor, and a Boltzmann Medal laureate.

description.zh-cn: 日本统计学家，九州大学校友，田口方法的发明者。
description.en: Japanese statistician, Kyushu University alumnus, and the inventor of the Taguchi methods.

description.zh-cn: 九州大学校友，CDDA规格的开发者，被誉为“CD之父”。
description.en: Kyushu University alumnus, developer of the CDDA specification, known as the 'Father of the CD'.

description.zh-cn: 九州大学教授，1919年诺贝尔生理学或医学奖候选人。
description.en: Kyushu University professor, candidate for the 1919 Nobel Prize in Physiology or Medicine.

description.zh-cn: 九州大学教授，日本血吸虫的发现者。
description.en: Kyushu University professor, discoverer of Schistosoma japonicum.

description.zh-cn: 九州大学教授，心脏房室结的发现者。
description.en: Kyushu University professor, discoverer of the atrioventricular node in the heart.

description.zh-cn: 九州大学校友、教授，阿富汗难民救助者，拉蒙·麦格塞塞奖得主。
description.en: Kyushu University alumnus and professor, aid worker for Afghan refugees, and a Ramon Magsaysay Award laureate.

description.zh-cn: 九州大学教授，日本耳鼻喉科学先驱。
description.en: Kyushu University professor, a pioneer of otorhinolaryngology in Japan.

description.zh-cn: 九州大学教授，日本外科学先驱。
description.en: Kyushu University professor, a pioneer of surgery in Japan.

description.zh-cn: 九州大学校友、教授，1919年诺贝尔生理学或医学奖候选人。
description.en: Kyushu University alumnus and professor, candidate for the 1919 Nobel Prize in Physiology or Medicine.

description.zh-cn: 九州大学校友、教授，1937年诺贝尔生理学或医学奖候选人。
description.en: Kyushu University alumnus and professor, candidate for the 1937 Nobel Prize in Physiology or Medicine.

description.zh-cn: 九州大学教授，1964年诺贝尔生理学或医学奖候选人。
description.en: Kyushu University professor, candidate for the 1964 Nobel Prize in Physiology or Medicine.

description.zh-cn: 九州大学校友，桥本氏甲状腺炎的发现者。
description.en: Kyushu University alumnus, discoverer of Hashimoto's thyroiditis.

description.zh-cn: 九州大学校友，美国国家科学院院士，京都奖得主，师从木村资生。
description.en: Kyushu University alumnus, member of the U.S. National Academy of Sciences, Kyoto Prize laureate, and student of Motoo Kimura.

description.zh-cn: 日本生物学家，根井正利的导师。
description.en: Japanese biologist, mentor to Masatoshi Nei.

description.zh-cn: 九州大学教授，CRISPR的发现者。
description.en: Kyushu University professor, discoverer of CRISPR.

description.zh-cn: 九州大学校友、教授，免疫学专家。
description.en: Kyushu University alumnus and professor, expert in immunology.

description.zh-cn: 中国文学家、作家、诗人，九州大学校友，中国科学院首任院长，中国科学技术大学首任校长。
description.en: Chinese literary figure, author, and poet; Kyushu University alumnus; the first president of the Chinese Academy of Sciences and the first president of the University of Science and Technology of China.

description.zh-cn: 日本作家，九州大学校友，芥川奖得主，诺贝尔文学奖候选人。
description.en: Japanese writer, Kyushu University alumnus, Akutagawa Prize winner, and Nobel Prize in Literature candidate.

description.zh-cn: 日本作家，九州大学校友，芥川奖得主。
description.en: Japanese writer, Kyushu University alumnus, and Akutagawa Prize winner.

description.zh-cn: 日本小说家，九州大学校友，读卖文学奖得主。
description.en: Japanese novelist, Kyushu University alumnus, and Yomiuri Prize winner.

description.zh-cn: 日本畅销作家，九州大学校友。
description.en: Japanese best-selling author and Kyushu University alumnus.

description.zh-cn: 九州大学教授，日本历史学家。
description.en: Kyushu University professor and Japanese historian.

description.zh-cn: 九州大学教授，医史学家，文化交流史学家。
description.en: Kyushu University professor, medical historian, and historian of cultural exchange.

description.zh-cn: 日本史学者，台湾中国文化大学校长，九州大学校友。
description.en: Scholar of Japanese history, president of Chinese Culture University in Taiwan, and Kyushu University alumnus.

description.zh-cn: 日本漫画家，九州大学校友。
description.en: Japanese manga artist and Kyushu University alumnus.

description.zh-cn: 日本政治人物，曾任日本参议院议员，九州大学校友。
description.en: Japanese politician, former member of the House of Councillors, and Kyushu University alumnus.

description.zh-cn: 日本政治人物，曾任日本众议院议员，九州大学校友。
description.en: Japanese politician, former member of the House of Representatives, and Kyushu University alumnus.

description.zh-cn: 台湾医师、政治人物，前嘉义市长，台湾史上首位女博士，九州大学校友。
description.en: Taiwanese physician and politician, former mayor of Chiayi City, the first female PhD in Taiwanese history, and a Kyushu University alumna.

description.zh-cn: 日本长崎市市长，九州大学校友。
description.en: Mayor of Nagasaki, Japan, and a Kyushu University alumnus.

description.zh-cn: 台湾医师，前代理台北市长，九州大学校友。
description.en: Taiwanese physician, former acting mayor of Taipei, and a Kyushu University alumnus.

description.zh-cn: 出生于台湾的美国实业家，新聚思科技创办人，九州大学校友。
description.en: Taiwan-born American businessman, founder of SYNNEX Corporation, and a Kyushu University alumnus.

description.zh-cn: 台湾金门县第十届立法委员，九州大学校友。
description.en: Member of the 10th Legislative Yuan for Kinmen County, Taiwan, and a Kyushu University alumna.

description.zh-cn: 台湾生物学者，东海大学理学院院长，九州大学校友。
description.en: Taiwanese biologist, Dean of the College of Science at Tunghai University, and a Kyushu University alumnus.

description.zh-cn: 台湾医学教授，台北万芳医院院长(2016)，九州大学校友。
description.en: Taiwanese medical professor, Superintendent of Taipei Wanfang Hospital (2016), and a Kyushu University alumnus.

description.zh-cn: 前国立台湾海洋大学海洋法律研究所所长，九州大学校友。
description.en: Former Director of the Institute of Marine Law at National Taiwan Ocean University and a Kyushu University alumna.

description.zh-cn: 台湾国防大学法律系系主任(2016)，九州大学校友。
description.en: Chair of the Department of Law at National Defense University, Taiwan (2016), and a Kyushu University alumna.

description.zh-cn: 国立台湾师范大学化学系系主任(2016)，九州大学校友。
description.en: Chair of the Department of Chemistry at National Taiwan Normal University (2016) and a Kyushu University alumnus.

description.zh-cn: 中国医药大学教授、前长庚大学教授，九州大学校友。
description.en: Professor at China Medical University, former professor at Chang Gung University, and a Kyushu University alumnus.

description.zh-cn: 国立彰化师范大学地理系副教授，九州大学校友。
description.en: Associate Professor in the Department of Geography at National Changhua University of Education and a Kyushu University alumnus.

description.zh-cn: 下水道工程处营管科高级科长，九州大学校友。
description.en: Senior Section Chief at the Sewerage Systems Office and a Kyushu University alumna.

nodes.id: 九州大学活体解剖事件

zh-cn: 九州大学活体解剖事件

description.zh-cn: 二战末期在日本九州帝国大学医学部发生的一起活体解剖事件。
description.en: A vivisection incident that occurred at the Faculty of Medicine of Kyushu Imperial University at the end of World War II.

description.zh-cn: 1867年，当时统治福冈地区的黑田藩（福冈藩）于天神设立了实行医学教育的藩校赞生馆。
description.en: In 1867, the Kuroda Domain (Fukuoka Domain), which ruled the Fukuoka area at the time, established the domain school Sanseikan in Tenjin to provide medical education.

description.zh-cn: 九州大学起源于1867年的福冈藩医学校赞生馆。
description.en: Kyushu University originated from the Fukuoka Domain Medical School, Sanseikan, in 1867.

relationships.source: 京都帝国大学福冈医科大学

description.zh-cn: 1903年，设立京都帝国大学福冈医科大学，作为京都帝大的分科大学。
description.en: In 1903, the Kyoto Imperial University Fukuoka College of Medicine was established as a college of Kyoto Imperial University.

relationships.source: 京都帝国大学福冈医科大学

description.zh-cn: 京都帝国大学福冈医科大学是后来的九州帝国大学的前身。
description.en: The Kyoto Imperial University Fukuoka College of Medicine was the predecessor of the later Kyushu Imperial University.

description.zh-cn: 古河财阀的捐赠促成了九州帝国大学（九州大学前身）于1911年的成立。
description.en: Donations from the Furukawa zaibatsu led to the establishment of Kyushu Imperial University (the predecessor of Kyushu University) in 1911.

description.zh-cn: 1922年9月25日，爱因斯坦访问了当时的九州帝国大学理工学部。
description.en: On September 25, 1922, Albert Einstein visited the Faculty of Science and Engineering of what was then Kyushu Imperial University.

relationships.source: 九州大学附属医学专门部

description.zh-cn: 1949年，九州大学附属医学专门部被合并，成为新制九州大学的一部分。
description.en: In 1949, the Kyushu University Affiliated Medical Specialty Department was merged to become part of the new Kyushu University.

description.zh-cn: 1949年，福冈高等学校被合并，成为新制九州大学的一部分。
description.en: In 1949, Fukuoka High School was merged to become part of the new Kyushu University.

description.zh-cn: 1949年，久留米工业专门学校被合并，成为新制九州大学的一部分。
description.en: In 1949, Kurume Technical College was merged to become part of the new Kyushu University.

description.zh-cn: 2003年，九州艺术工科大学与九州大学并校。
description.en: In 2003, the Kyushu Institute of Design merged with Kyushu University.

description.zh-cn: 根井正利师从木村资生。
description.en: Masatoshi Nei was a student of Motoo Kimura.

relationships.target: 九州大学活体解剖事件

description.zh-cn: 九州大学活体解剖事件发生于当时的九州帝国大学医学部。
description.en: The Kyushu University vivisection incident took place at the Faculty of Medicine of what was then Kyushu Imperial University.
